channel.title: Comments on: What Yahoo Finance Looks Like Without Flash

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2011/11/09/what-yahoo-finance-looks-like-without-flash/#comment-3917">paul</a>.
Perhaps they are looking for specific versions of Flash, I'm not sure.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to paul.

Perhaps they are looking for specific versions of Flash, I’m not sure.

item.title: By: paul
item.dc:creator: paul
item.description: I have flash installed the version is Adobe Flash Player 11.1.102.55 and I am being redirected to this page also. What do I do to show the charts for different time periods on Yahoo Finance??
item.content:encoded: I have flash installed the version is Adobe Flash Player 11.1.102.55 and I am being redirected to this page also. What do I do to show the charts for different time periods on Yahoo Finance??
